1 Office Importer ## Check the space #if(!$request.targetSpace || $request.targetSpace=="") #error("Missing target space name. Please [go back>Import.WebHome] and correct it.") #else #set($targetSpace=$request.targetSpace) #end
## Check the pagename #if(!$request.targetPage || $request.targetPage=="") #error("Missing target page name. Please [go back>Import.WebHome] and correct it.") #else #set($targetPage=$request.targetPage) #end
## Check the file path #set($fileUpload=$xwiki.fileupload) #set($fileName=$fileUpload.getFileName("filePath")) #if(!$fileName || $fileName=="") #error("Missing input file. Please [go back>Import.WebHome] and correct it.") #end
## do convert #if(!$targetSpace || !$targetPage || !$fileName) #error("Invalid input. Please [go back>Import.WebHome] and correct it.") #else #set($fileContent=$fileUpload.getFileItemData("filePath")) #set($options={"filterStyles":${request.filterStyles}}) #set($targetDocument="${targetSpace}.${targetPage}") #set($result=$officeimporter.importDocument($fileContent, $fileName, $targetDocument, $options)) #if($result) #info("Conversion succeeded. You can view the *[result>$targetSpace.$targetPage]*, or you can [go back>Import.WebHome] to convert another document.") #else #error($officeimporter.getMessage()) #end #end
